snippet.title: Catty & Batty: DevLog #1 - Introduction
snippet.description:
Join me on my adventure of making my next game called Catty & Batty 2: The Spirit Guide!
Become a patron to get early access (available soon): https://www.patreon.com/muddasheep
Russian subtitles by Djigallag: https://www.deviantart.com/djigallag

🐈 🦇

Everything you see is a work in progress, especially the cut(e)scenes! When I mention that maps and overworld are "complete", I mean the first drafts, there's a lot that still needs to be done, of course. xD

Thanks for watching! Hope you'll all enjoy this series of devlogs. Please let me know what you think in the comments!

More about Catty & Batty:
https://cattybatty.muddasheep.com

Halfquake Trilogy devlog entries:
https://www.patreon.com/muddasheep/posts?filters%5Btag%5D=hqtrilogylog&sort=published_at

Halfquake Sunrise devlog entries:
https://farm.muddasheep.com/hq3/behind_the_death_scenes/

°~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~°

0:00 Introduction
1:35 Current Status
2:22 Early Beginnings
3:40 Pause Screen
4:17 What's next?

°~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~°

💚🖤 Special thank you to my patrons: Futeko Snowfeather, nola, Manuel, LILmighty, Jazz, Alexis Clay, Paul Danyliuk, Pao Sebastian, Jace, Andrey, AxelhacK, deliriumstalker, Lexi, Neoviper, Malastrome, Emanuel Regenhardt, moonlyer, LupusRex, funnycreature, Michael Hillard, RickyRio, Legendary_Pups, Sharpet, Syruss, Jancias, Mark Valentine, Clay, nyyet, KeshaFilm, Coda, EksCelle, s.Jane Mills, gadirhkop, JazzyMike, Oleg, Mowi and Barioncr!

°~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~°

🔹 Socialize:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/muddasheep
VK: https://vk.com/muddasheep
Twitch: https://twitch.tv/muddasheep
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/muddasheep
